examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Presenter view - Urgent help

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi , when i finish recording presentation, i play the video <NAME>'s a voice said trial version. How can i solve this problem.
tq

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello,

we just want to thank you for your amazing design tool!
We just created our first long video ("Happy New Year") for our website/community, 
and we absolutely LOVE Canva!
It’s so easy and beautiful!

And we are proud of the first result, it took us just a few hours… : )
If you are interested, here is the link to our website (the video is at the bottom):

<URL>

Thanks again and best wishes

Verena & Alex (from Germany)

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: Hello this is my second time contacting customer service because your representative <NAME> has become unresponsive. I did every “fix” on my end that they suggested and nothing resolved the issue. Now I would like some actual assistance with your software error. When I make a video that is laid out vertically (from the top of my phone to the bottom of my phone) it looks great and is able to play in the app. However when I download the video it become a horizontal video (from the left side to the right side of my phone). The art is still vertical so it only a square of it shows up in the middle and it has two blank or white rectangles on either side. I use Canva for my business and this issue is delaying the launch of our companies website. As I mentioned I have already uninstalled/ reinstalled, tried it on a desktop site etc. Please advise

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Unable to present

Describe your issue: how do I use voice over on a video collage. do i need to prerecord it or does can offer a way to record the voice-over?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I can't find my presentation.

Describe your issue: Clicking on an external site (our own website or another Canva presentation) from a Canva presentation gives us a warning page - we need to disable this and/or whitelist sites.

Describe your issue: I can not hear the video

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have made a video, but I want to add a voice over.  Can I do that?  If so, how do I record it so it plays with the video?  Thanks.  <NAME> <EMAIL>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My video doesn’t have voice, even when I choose something from Canva

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello

I'd realy welcome your help... I realy think Canva's great and it's just so sad there isn't a helpline that can help directly as I have asked this one before.

Presenter View... I have followed every instruction, but I do not get the small wind open, which your instructions say I should slide to one side. 

This is urgent! I have tried and tried to get presenter view. I have just had to do a three day masterclass, wiht slides full of WORDS in them as I need them to prompt me what to say (as no presenter view). I also can't see the next slide coming up!

Please can someone help. 

To get around this, I downloaded it into Powerpoint and went LIVE. Huge mistake as the formatting was all over... this doesn't work. I have had to re record this presentation.

PLEASE - If someone can help on this... I know the system can do it but I really need to see how.

Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Can you please confirm if I am able to extend the video time per slide in my presentations to more than 30 seconds? Thank you.
What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Good evening Is it possible to take a snapshot from a video?
What kind of problem ?: Other than that, describe your problem: What is in your folder? Why is this video? But it is a little sweet

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello!
I would like to know if viewing presenter notes while presenting is only for CanvaPro users?  I am a free user and I am unable to view my presenter notes during the presentation.  Thank you.

Describe your issue: Almost everytime when i want tot make an ad for my company, the video doesn't come out well. And all the logo's, flyers etc. are coming out as a blur. 
How could this be? Could you fix it? Otherwise i'm taking my business else were.

What kind of problem?: Saving

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Why not disply canva video

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I'm looking for a 10 minute countdown video. do you have any available?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: If we choose enterprise, do we get the extra as in PRO? Like 4 more? How can I increase my volume of the library with videos and pic? Cost?
Team Dreamcoast
Camilla Hiller

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: For a video why can't you exceed 30.0s? Please change that!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello! I saw your email about my issue. It says, "My issue is about glitching. So I put two videos on the same page. When I viewed my design, one of the videos showed a brief clip from the beginning. I refreshed the page and it was still there. I hope that you can fix this!" I would like to keep this request open. Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: The video skips and makes static noises.
